title: Apple Stock Investors Just Got Great News. Is It Time to Buy?
description: A federal judge ruled on an antitrust lawsuit against Alphabet, allowing Google to continue paying Apple for search distribution while prohibiting exclusive agreements. Despite avoiding a major legal setback, Apple faces challenges with stagnant innovation and an expensive stock valuation.

title: Apple's $20 Billion Search Payment Survives: Here's What It Means for the Stock
description: A US court ruling allows Apple to continue receiving billions in licensing fees from Google Search, but the company faces challenges in AI development and future search market dynamics.
